# Estimated generation

## Data requirements/sources
Estimate based on historic flow records (e.g., USGS stream gauge data) and information about installed hydropower infrastructure or estimate based on an empirical relationship between installed capacity and effective generation in similar dams

## Citations
([Pasha et al. 2018](https://ascelibrary.org/doi/10.1061/%28ASCE%29WR.1943-5452.0000901){target="_blank"}; [Almeida et al. 2019](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-019-12179-5){target="_blank"}; [Song et al. 2020](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.resconrec.2020.104990){target="_blank"})
